website_summaries.verdict: Excellent range and dependable battery life make this model worth a look despite a few known quirks.
pros: Has send, flag, and search settings for different scenarios, including different burial situations
Runs on 3 AA batteries and gets notably long battery life
cons: Switch is touchy and can easily be bumped out of the preferred mode
Screen is somewhat small, but readout is clear

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: If you google PIEPS right now, you will see that this product is not quality and you are risking your life by using it. I have had it since earlier this year, and trauma has caused it to turn off 2x - NOT WHAT I WANT IN AN AVALANCHE BEACON. If the seller sees this, please contact me directly as I would like a full recall on the product. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, its awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The standard for avalanche beacons. Used this in my avi class and it is super phenomenal... precision down to 0.1 m! I don't think you need to get the pro version, and for $270 (christmas deal), you can't beat it for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good to have, hope he never has to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who is an avid skiier. Hope he never has to use it but it helps us feel better when he goes back country. He watched the video and says he is comfortable with how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: 3 Cat Mama

customer_reviews.title: The standard, by which other beacons are judged.
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. Quick acquisition of multiple beacons. Used my buddies spare a number of times before buying my own. Like old faithful, just keep fresh batteries in it.
customer_reviews.author: bikerjosh

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the beacon
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the beacon. It is very easy to use and makes multiple burials a breeze. Unfortunately on my very first use the plastic piece that tethers to the harness broke making it impossible to connect it to your body. I was a bit uncomfortable with the switch at first moving around accidentally but it doesn't seem to be a real problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be safe. Ride hard. Winter is short.
customer_reviews.text: Never ever ride without someone. Never ever ride with a beacon. You never know what will happen when your out there.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have done a few test runs with another unit I have. My other unit I have is an older Peeps unit (probably 15 years old) Was totally amazed with the ease and precision of these newer units. I work part time at a ski resort, so I had a friend on ski patrol do a little test with me, and it performed great. I mostly use it for my snow trail runs this winter, and the harness is comfortable and holds it in place nicely. Gave it 4 start cause I rarely give 5, I would highly recommend this unit though.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: And that's a good thing. Simple
customer_reviews.text: If fisher-price made an Avy transceiver this would be it. And that's a good thing. Simple, easy, and very good reception/broadcast.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Beacon.
customer_reviews.text: Easy operation and design for cold weather and gloves. Long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Bursk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected with case and harness. Easy to use. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: George R.

customer_reviews.title: I guess he loved it! Hope to never need to use it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband , I guess he loved it! Hope to never need to use it !
customer_reviews.author: jambu

customer_reviews.title: FATAL MANUFACTURING DEFECT! Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!! Switch mechanism can be forced into a different position during an avalanche making it impossible for your partner to locate you. NEEDS RECALLED!
customer_reviews.author: a knife

customer_reviews.title: Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.text: The screen went blank on it the third time I used it. Contacted BD multiple times and never heard back from them. A month later I was finally able to get in touch with them, they told me they would replace it but it would ‘probably be before next ski season’ which is eight months away or they could give me a refund. I just want a beacon that works. From the sound of it they’re having many issues like this with this beacon.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Staw away: Poorly designed lock switch allows it to shut off with sufficient force.
customer_reviews.text: There's a growing number of people who have discovered that the lock switch breaks easily, causing the unit to inadvertantly turn off. This has been observed in at least one burial situation. Pieps updated this switch in newer models but will not replace your unit if it is out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Baker

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: The slider mechanism on this product wears out and can shut off without the user knowing. DO NOT RISK YOUR LIFE WITH THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Olson

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw, safety hazard!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY this product!!! There is a well-known design flaw that causes the beacon to switch modes during use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
